body.p: Prison of the State of Indiana. Located in Jeffersonville, Indiana. Operated from 1822 to 1897. Housed inmates from southern Indiana between 1860 and 1897. Wardens: David W. Miller (1860-1863), Thomas Wood (1864), David W. Miller (1865).
